nodes.text: The Albanin sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories on the frontier of Galactic Republic space. It contained the planets Barab I, Blaudu Sextus, Blaudu Octus, Sim'char'ser, Thassalia, Clantaano III, and Daluuj.
Under the Galactic Empire, the local Moff of Albanin sector ordered the investigation that resulted in the end of safaris to hunt Barabels.
The novel Outbound Flight incorrectly places the Roxuli system in the Albanin sector, which is on the other side of the galaxy.
